footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Faruzan | Update Date: 12/14/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Elegy for the End, Sacrificial Bow, End of the Line, Fading Twilight

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge|<goblet> Anemo DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: The Wind's Secret Ways
**2)** Elemental Skill: Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
Normal Attack: Parthian Shot does not need to be raised.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
It is more important at Constellation 0 to Constellation 5 to build Energy Recharge (usually around 300% with one other Anemo character) than get the full set bonus. However, The Exile and Emblem of Severed Fate's 2-piece bonus is to be considered. 

Same goes for a the goblet, where Anemo DMG Bonus goblets lose to any goblet with high Energy Recharge substats.
